description: Ground truth labels for 10 calls, manually classified as good/bad with rationale

calls.rationale: Excellent rapport building, personalized approach using referral connection, captured all requirements, scheduled visit with builder rep. Professional closure.
No proper greeting, dismissive attitude, didn't explore alternatives for budget, abrupt ending. No effort to help or qualify.
Corporate pitch done well, addressed technical questions professionally, offered solutions for lock-in and parking, scheduled visit with specifics.
Great handling of first-time buyer, offered guidance, connected banking partners, gave preparation checklist. Empathetic and thorough.
Called wrong/spam number, didn't listen to customer saying they didn't enquire, persisted despite customer objection. Potentially harassment.
Customer had budget reduction due to financial issues. Agent was dismissive, suggested to 'wait 6 months', no empathy or alternatives offered.
Honest about budget constraints, suggested realistic alternatives (Navi Mumbai), offered to send options. Helpful even when deal wasn't immediate.
Senior-friendly discussion, addressed all elderly-specific concerns (medical, accessibility), offered to arrange accessible transport. Very thoughtful.
Customer comparing options, agent was defensive about amenities, pushed with 'prices will increase' fear tactic. Didn't address objections constructively.
Traditional buyer handled respectfully, Vastu certificate offered, welcomed engineer inspection, negotiated respectfully, arranged Puja muhurat. Cultural sensitivity.
